text:
2017 Hollywood Film Awards ceremony took place on November 5th and has opened this year’s award season. The Hollywood Film Awards are held annually since 1997. The gala ceremony takes place at the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills, California. The event was hosted by James Cordon for the third time in a row.

One of the best moments in this year’s ceremony was when Kate Winslet – who was being honored for her performance in the new Woody Allen movie Wonder Wheel — began her speech by praising the creativity in the room. Then, the actress singled out Allison Janney as someone she greatly admired. This was followed by Janney making her way to the stage for a quick kiss with Winslet!

Here’s the complete list of all winners!
title: 2017 Hollywood Film Awards: The Complete List of Winners
